content: Starting this topic a bit early because I want to make sure the backport nomination for #85953 gets on the agenda for tomorrow.
I'm sorry for not doing a PR to change the agenda generator so that PRs like this get listed yet.

no problem at all, I think just creating the meeting stream early to mention agenda items ahead of time is perfect and have gone so far as to update the charter to recommend this approach for when nominating an issue isn't possible.
Hey @T-libs :tada: We have a meeting at 2021-07-21T20:00:00+02:00
Agenda: https://hackmd.io/6EXLMTh_Q-auh8QjH4SdPw
Hey @T-libs-api :tada: We have a meeting at 2021-07-21T21:00:00+02:00
Agenda: https://hackmd.io/@rust-libs/SJrfLCS0_
I've added your backport nomination to the t-libs agenda @inquisitivecrystal
BTW I likely won't be able to use my microphone today, they're testing the fire alarms and its been going off for the last 50 minutes...
with any luck they will be done before the meeting starts but I'm not holding my breath
doesn't sound like that test is going well... but better to find out now

cuviper said:

doesn't sound like that test is going well... but better to find out now

I think its actually going fine. They're going from room to room to check every alarm is working
i just didn't expect them to leave them ALL ON while they did so
i figured they'd trigger them room by room but I guess that's not a feature they built into the building
paid for by big corp, "how do you like remote work now?" :wink:
:[
angry face turned into a sad face with a hat
lol
Reminder to double check the action items before the meeting to check off anything you've already finished

Libs-API: https://hackmd.io/ovrbJj6CRduRgSA0Wzg2zg
Libs: https://hackmd.io/Uehlc0qUQfWfvY1swYWRgQ
so they're to be checked off now, and removed after the meeting?
sure, I'm not sure I planned that far ahead but that's effectively what I've been doing :sweat_smile:
@matklad would you be able to join the T-libs-api meeting today to provide context on https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/74465?
I expect having you present will help the discussion substantially since Ashley who did most of the review originally and has the context isn't currently on the libs team
I'm reading through the issues right now to try to get up to speed but there's only so much I can do in half an hour
probably shoulda reviewed this earlier but I forgot ._.
also, to be clear the libs-api meeting is in an hour and a half, we just have another meeting the hour before that
When is the meeting? finished reading the message, year, I'll joni!
could the jitsi link for each meeting be added to the agenda templates?
yea, seems like everyone's onboard with making the link part of the agenda
I'll add them manually this week and update the agenda generator after the meetings
@matklad just to make sure you're aware, if your interest is only in the once_cell discussion then that will be discussed in the second meeting, and not the one starting right now
ping @Josh Triplett
Joining...
@T-libs-api meeting time
cc @matklad
:wave:
is it on zulip or is there some magic link?
its on jitsi
link is in the agenda at the top of this topic
